trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs is constructed and passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem> event when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> methods on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs bygde og sendt til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem>hendelsen når du kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>metoder for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen i virtuelle modus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the search is a text search.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om det skal et søk etter tekst.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the search is a prefix search.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om det skal et prefiks søk.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether to include subitems of list items in the search.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om inkludere underelementene på elementer i søket.

trans-unit.source: The text of the item to search for.
trans-unit.target: Teksten for elementet til å søke etter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> at which to start the search.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som søket skal starte.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> at which to start the search.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> som søket skal starte.

trans-unit.source: Gets the direction from the current item that the search should take place.
trans-unit.target: Henter retningen fra gjeldende element som søket skal skje.

trans-unit.source: Identifying the nearest item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control can vary depending on the operating system the application is running on; therefore, the search direction is a hint, and not an absolute guarantee of results.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer nærmeste elementet i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen kan variere avhengig av operativsystemet programmet kjører på; derfor søkeretningen er et tips og ikke en absolutt garantere av resultatene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the search should include subitems of list items.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om søket skal ta med underelementene på elementer.

trans-unit.source: Subitems are typically used when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> view.
trans-unit.target: Underelementene er vanligvis brukes når en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>visningen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if subitems should be included in the search; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis underelementene skal inkluderes i søket. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> found in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> .
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> funnet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> .

trans-unit.source: Set the Index property to the index of the item matching the search criteria when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem> event.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen indeksen til indeksen for elementet samsvarer med søkekriteriene under behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> found in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> funnet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the search should return an item if its text starts with the search text.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om søket skal returnere et element hvis teksten starter med søketeksten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Text%2A> property can specify a substring of the desired text.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Text%2A>egenskapen kan angi en delstreng med ønsket tekst.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IsPrefixSearch property indicates whether the search should match items that start with the search text.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IsPrefixSearch angir om søket må samsvare med elementer som begynner med søketeksten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the search should match item text that starts with the search text; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis søket må samsvare med elementet som begynner med søketeksten; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the search is a text search.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om det skal et søk etter tekst.

trans-unit.source: You can search a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control by location by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> method, or you can perform a text search by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan søke en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll av plassering ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>metode, eller du kan utføre et søk etter tekst ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the search is a text search; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the search is a location search.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis søket er et søk etter tekst; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis søket er et plassering-søk.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> where the search starts.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> der søket skal startes.

trans-unit.source: This property is used for a location search.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes for et plassering-søk.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> indicating where the search starts
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> som angir der søket skal startes

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting location of the search.
trans-unit.target: Henter startposisjonen for søket.

trans-unit.source: You can search a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control by location by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> method, or you can perform a text search by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan søke en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll av plassering ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>metode, eller du kan utføre et søk etter tekst ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that indicates the starting location of the search.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som angir startposisjonen for søket.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text used to find an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter teksten som brukes til å finne et element i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can search a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control by location by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> method, or you can perform a text search by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan søke en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll av plassering ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>metode, eller du kan utføre et søk etter tekst ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The text used to find an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som brukes til å finne et element i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.
